summary.span: Occurs when the collection changes.

span.span: Occurs when the collection changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合更改的示例包括添加或删除的列。Examples of collection changes include additions or removals of columns. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridViewColumnCollection1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridViewColumnCollection1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#372](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#372)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#372](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#372)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn GetFirstColumn(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates includeFilter) cil managed
Public Function GetFirstColumn (includeFilter As DataGridViewElementStates) As DataGridViewColumn

param.name: includeFilter
param.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represents the filter for inclusion.

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represents the filter for inclusion.

summary.span: Returns the first column in display order that meets the given inclusion-filter requirements.

span.span: Returns the first column in display order that meets the given inclusion-filter requirements.

returns.span: The first column in display order that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

span.span: The first column in display order that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示序列中的第一列是具有最低值，而不论列在屏幕上是否可见。The first column in display order is the column with the lowest value, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. 此方法可让你确定符合给定的条件而无需直接比较索引值的第一列。This method lets you determine the first column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来交换的第一个显示的列和最后一个显示的列。The following code example uses the method to swap the first displayed column and the last displayed column. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#170)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#170)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#170)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示序列中的最后一列是最高的列值，而不论列在屏幕上是否可见。The last column in display order is the column with the highest value, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. 此方法可让你确定符合给定的条件而无需直接比较索引值的最后一列。This method lets you determine the last column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来交换最后一个显示的列和第一个显示的列。The following code example uses the method to swap the last displayed column and the first displayed column. span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represent the filter to apply for inclusion.

param.name: excludeFilter

summary.span: Gets the first column after the given column in display order that meets the given filter requirements.

span.span: Gets the first column after the given column in display order that meets the given filter requirements.

returns.span: The next column that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

span.span: The next column that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示顺序中的下一步列是具有最低的列值高于指定列，无论是否在屏幕上是否可见列的值。The next column in display order is the column with the lowest value higher than the value of the specified column, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. 此方法可让你确定符合给定的条件而无需直接比较索引值的当前列后的下一列。This method lets you determine the next column after the current column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
